channel.title: Noob question
channel.description: I want to add funpk, but I don't know how to add it in the "youDied" method so it doesn't take all your items away. I've only messed with the "youDied" method once a really long time ago, so my skills are to rusty, and I messed up the first time (good thing I saved client backups) but yeah..

item.title: Noob question

item.description:
